Filter.FilterExpression: (RQWHERE("exists(select 0 from TRN_DD_DBF where TRN_HDR_DBF.M_NB = TRN_DD_DBF.M_NB and TRN_DD_DBF.M_LIMPECL in (' ','1.589','MwDcj67841','1.371','MJgYK37904','1.514','MlUYG61356', 'MtBUj55594','MuLns65384','1.512','1.517','1.678','1.638'))","").AND.TRN_TYPE<>"ORG".AND.BINTERNAL<>SINTERNAL).AND.((TRN_STATUS<>"DEAD".AND.TRN_FMLY=="CURR").OR.(TRN_GRP=="OPT").OR.(TRN_FMLY=="CRD".AND.TRN_GRP=="CDS").OR.(TRN_FMLY=="IRD".AND.((TRN_GRP<>"LN_BR".AND.TRN_GRP<>"BOND".AND.TRN_GRP<>"LFUT".AND.TRN_GRP<>"SFUT").OR.TRN_TYPO="MM".OR.TRN_TYPO="TD"))).OR.(TRN_TYPO=="NDF".AND.RQWHERE("exists(select 0 from TRN_DD_DBF where TRN_HDR_DBF.M_NB = TRN_DD_DBF.M_NB and TRN_DD_DBF.M_LIMPECL='1.514')",""))
